query:
INSERT INTO finance_articles (title, slug, description, content, readTime, difficulty, tags, author, published) VALUES
('Budgeting 101: The 50/30/20 Rule', 'budgeting-50-30-20-rule', 'The simple budget that actually works - no spreadsheets required.', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-01-budgeting-50-30-20.md', 5, 'beginner', 'budgeting,basics,money-management', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE),
('Zero-Based Budgeting: Give Every Dollar a Job', 'zero-based-budgeting', 'The budget for control freaks (and that''s a compliment).', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-02-zero-based-budgeting.md', 7, 'beginner', 'budgeting,planning,money-management', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE),
('Envelope System Budgeting: Cash Is King', 'envelope-system-budgeting', 'The old-school budget that still works.', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-03-envelope-system.md', 6, 'beginner', 'budgeting,cash-management,spending-control', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE),
('Banking Basics: Choosing the Right Accounts', 'banking-basics-choosing-accounts', 'Stop paying your bank to hold your money.', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-04-banking-basics.md', 6, 'beginner', 'banking,savings,checking-accounts', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE),
('Credit Score Fundamentals', 'credit-score-fundamentals', 'The three-digit number that follows you everywhere.', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-05-credit-score-fundamentals.md', 7, 'beginner', 'credit,credit-score,financial-health', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE),
('Reading Your Credit Report', 'reading-your-credit-report', 'Your financial permanent record and how to read it.', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-06-reading-credit-report.md', 6, 'beginner', 'credit,credit-report,financial-literacy', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE),
('Good Debt vs. Bad Debt', 'good-debt-vs-bad-debt', 'Not all borrowing is evil.', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-07-good-debt-vs-bad-debt.md', 6, 'beginner', 'debt,borrowing,financial-strategy', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE),
('Avalanche vs. Snowball Method', 'avalanche-vs-snowball-method', 'Two strategies, one goal: get out of debt.', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-08-avalanche-vs-snowball.md', 7, 'beginner', 'debt-payoff,debt-management,financial-strategy', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE),
('Compound Interest Explained', 'compound-interest-explained', 'The force that makes or breaks you.', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-09-compound-interest.md', 6, 'beginner', 'compound-interest,investing,savings,debt', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE),
('Emergency Fund Basics', 'emergency-fund-basics', 'Your financial safety net.', 'file:///home/ubuntu/learn-finance-articles/article-10-emergency-fund.md', 6, 'beginner', 'emergency-fund,savings,financial-security', 'SASS-E Team', TRUE);
